      • add

        public boolean add(java.lang.Object obj,
                   java.lang.String fileName)
        Add a data object as a serial file
        参数:
        obj - The data object
        fileName - The corresponding file name of the data object
        返回:
        true if success and false if fail

      • getById

        返回:
